original_text: You saw the useless gods that people of other nations worship. They worship idols that they make from wood, stone, silver and gold.
korean_text: 너희가 또 그들 중에 있는 가증한 것과 목석과 은금의 우상을 보았느니라)

sentences.original_text: that people of other nations worship
that they make from wood, stone, silver and gold
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 나무, 돌, 은과 금으로 만드는
